name: FMBANews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The NJ FMBA represents over 5000 career firefighters, EMT's, and dispatchers in New Jersey. We are the loud and clear voice in Trenton for our members. Our mission is to inform, educate, protect the interests of the members of the NJ FMBA, and keep safe the civilians of the communities we serve.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
